page.title: 10Industry
page.content: This is not an industrial area, however, there are a few small factories and several warehouse and processing establishments. There are also several office blocks. The industrial/commercial area is confined to the Houndsmill Industrial Estate, part of which is in our grid. The industrial area makes up less than one twelfth of the grid. By far the most important activitiy is that of warehousing and distribution. This obviously reflects the proximity to the motorways, both east/west (M4) and east/south (M3). It must therefore reflect the ease of access to London, Heathrow Airport(London Airport), and Southampton Docks. The other industrial activities can be classified under light industrail concerns making use of the pool of skilled labour living in good housing.
